entry.title: Co Dining Chair, Outdoor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects & Els van Hoorebeeck
Type: Dining Chair
Price: 350.00 - 485.00 (2 variants)

Designed in weather-resistant recycled plastic for hassle-free upkeep, the Co Dining Chair, Outdoor is a practical and reliable choice for outdoor environments year-round. Its stackable design offers space-efficient solution for storage and convenient organisation when not in use. Despite its durability, the chair remains comfortable and lightweight, facilitating easy movement and rearrangement of outdoor seating arrangements as required, while its sleek and minimalist design, available with or without armrests, blends seamlessly into a range of settings, from patios to gardens.

entry.title: Afteroom Stool, Veneer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afteroom Studio
Type: Stool
Price: 335.00

With its characteristic clean lines and sturdy base in tubular black powder-coated steel, tethered with cross bars for support, the Afteroom Stool comes in three heights, making it easy to slide up to a bar, counter or table. Boasting a high standard of craftsmanship and durability for long-lasting use, in wood veneer the stool brings warmth and tactility to interiors while its sleek, minimalist profile ensures it fits seamlessly into any setting.

entry.title: Afteroom Dining Chair Plus, Fully Upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afteroom Studio
Type: Chair
Price: 600.00 - 810.00 (8 variants)

The Afteroom Dining Chair Plus elevates mealtimes to a new level of luxury with its upholstered seat and back, customisable in fabric to suit design and space preferences. A minimalist design offering maximum comfort, its tubular powder-coated steel frame ensures durability and stability while the large, extended backrest provides lumbar support when seated for extended periods. Its streamlined silhouette, pared back to only the essentials, ensures it fits seamlessly into any setting.

entry.title: Afteroom Dining Chair, Seat Upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afteroom Studio
Type: Chair
Price: 485.00 - 565.00 (4 variants)

With a silhouette that is both sleek and instantly recognisable, the Afteroom Dining Chair is offered with an upholstered backrest and a wood veneer seat, each delivering comfort when seated for longer periods. In wood veneer, the chair exudes a sense of authenticity and warmth, while upholstery allows for a comfortable, customisable design to suit any style and space. Seamlessly integrating into spaces with its sleek profile, offering a harmonious and coordinated design it is not just a functional piece but also a standout element in any interior space.

entry.title: Afteroom Bar Chair Plus, Fully Upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afteroom Studio
Type: Bar Chair
Price: 535.00 - 805.00 (8 variants)

An homage to functionalism, the Afteroom Bar Chair Plus is a deconstructed design, stripped of unnecessary components to present a clean, minimalist aesthetic with high functional value. Its wide wood veneer backrest and generous upholstered seat ensure supreme sitting comfort, while the slender powder-coated metal frame is constructed for maximum stability with a foot ring that does double duty as a rest for feet. The result is a blissfully simple chair that embraces minimalism and clean lines without compromising on comfort.

entry.title: Afteroom Counter Chair, Seat Upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afteroom Studio
Type: Counter Chair
Price: 630.00 - 725.00 (4 variants)

Embracing minimalism and clean lines without compromising on comfort, the Afteroom Counter Chair is an elevated design for kitchen counters and high tables. Using the same innovative concept as the collection’s dining chairs, the four-legged design reduces the material to a minimum while providing maximum support and stability. Seamlessly connecting to the wider collection, the wood veneer backrest provides a natural, warm finish, while the upholstered seat delivers added seating comfort and the opportunity to customise the fabric to suit design preferences and space.

entry.title: Passage Bar Stool, Upholstered Seat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Bar Chair
Price: 805.00 - 1140.00 (6 variants)

Looking to time-honoured Danish cabinetmaking traditions, the Passage Bar Stool displays modern design and woodworking through traditional techniques. Crafted from solid walnut or FSC™-certified solid oak with a lacquered finish, the rich colour and luxurious grain pattern inherent to the high-quality hardwood ensure an enduring aesthetic. Thoughtfully designed and offered in an upholstered version for added ease, a brushed brass or brushed steel foot ring ensures a comfortable seating experience for extended periods, while the stool's counter height aligns seamlessly with kitchens, bars and other communal spaces, making it a versatile design that effortlessly blends functionality with comfort. Its ingenious flat-pack construction encourages active participation in the assembly process.

s:variant.title: Natural Oak / Steel ring / Audo Bouclé 02

entry.title: Passage Pouf
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Pouf
Price: 1570.00 - 2525.00 (5 variants)

As an exclusive addition to the Passage collection, the pouf brings an air of elegance, making it a standout piece that enhances the overall ambiance and function of any space it occupies. Ideal as extra seating, the versatile design is suitable for living rooms, large hallways, walk-in closets and more. The upholstered seat cushion provides a customisable touch with a wide range of fabric options and the solid lacquered walnut or oak base adds a touch of warmth and sophistication to the design while ensuring durability and stability for long-lasting use.

entry.title: Passage Stool, Upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Chair
Price: 590.00 - 940.00 (6 variants)

The Passage Collection demonstrates meticulous attention to detail, highlighting a commitment to both comfort and aesthetics rooted in traditional woodworking techniques. In solid, lacquered walnut or FSC™-certified solid oak, the stackable stool presents unique grain patterns inherent to the high-quality hardwoods and a warm and inviting expression. With its upholstered seat, offered in customisable fabric options for a personal touch, the small but perfectly formed design provides a comfortable seating experience for extended periods.

entry.title: Passage Counter Stool, Upholstered Seat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Counter Chair
Price: 780.00 - 1100.00 (6 variants)

The upholstered Passage Counter Stool represents an elevated iteration of the original design and a heightened level of comfort. With its upholstered seat, providing a plush and inviting sitting experience, the versatile design is anchored by a solid wood base, in lacquered walnut or FSC™-certified natural oak, not only adding a touch of natural warmth to the design but also ensuring stability and durability for long-lasting use. Customisable fabric upholstery options provide a personal touch while a brushed steel or brushed brass foot ring enhances the comfort level. The Passage Collection demonstrates meticulous attention to detail, highlighting a commitment to both comfort and aesthetics rooted in traditional woodworking techniques.

s:variant.title: Natural Oak / Steel ring / Audo Bouclé 02

entry.title: Co Task Chair, Veneer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects & Els van Hoorebeeck
Type: Dining Chair
Price: 670.00 - 805.00 (12 variants)

The Co Task Armchair seamlessly integrates sitting comfort and flexible function into its minimalist expression. Designed for a wide range of work settings and set on a five-star Black or Aluminium swivel base with casters, a height-adjustable feature ensures adaptability to workspaces and user preferences, promoting ergonomic comfort for users of different heights. Together with supportive armrests, a flex tilt function in the seat and back enhances comfort, allowing for adjustment to the preferred seating position for optimal support during extended periods of use.
